mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOGS ( LOG_ID, LOG_CLASS_PATH, LOG_SQL, LOG_PARAM, LOG_REG_DT, LOG_REG_ID, LOG_LV, LOG_ERRORMSG ) VALUES ( #{log_id}, #{log_class_path}, #{log_sql}, #{log_param}, #{log_reg_dt}, #{log_reg_id}, #{log_lv}, #{log_errormsg} )
mapper.select: SELECT LOG_ID, LOG_CLASS_PATH, LOG_SQL, LOG_PARAM, LOG_REG_DT, LOG_REG_ID, LOG_LV, LOG_ERRORMSG FROM LOGS
